Safe air rifle status

Safe air rifle status â€“ at the firing point a safe rifle is:

 

•breech open,

•safety catch on, and

•pump handle open.

 

Off the firing point, the same criteria apply along with the safety rod must be inserted into the barrel and visible in the breech.

 

For more information review the air rifle handling test checklist in the reference section, and review CATO 14-41 for more information on safe handling and storage of air rifles.
